channel.title: Comments on: Create HTML from output of Perl::Critic
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Jeff Thalhammer
item.dc:creator: Jeff Thalhammer
item.description: Nice work -- this looks really sharp! I have lots of ideas to improve the perlcritic.com website, including inline violation reporting, like yours. Get in touch with me if you'd like to collaborate.
item.content:encoded: Nice work — this looks really sharp! I have lots of ideas to improve the perlcritic.com website, including inline violation reporting, like yours. Get in touch with me if you’d like to collaborate.
